import './intro.scss' import me from '../../img/me.png' import { ThemeContext } from '../../context' import { useContext,useRef } from 'react' import resume from "../../AyushLingwal_Resume.pdf" const Intro = () => { const theme =useContext(ThemeContext) const darkMode =theme.state.darkMode const contacme=useRef(null) const scrollTo=(element)=>{ window.scrollTo({ top:element.current.offsetTop, behavior:'smooth' }) } return (

Hello ! My name is

Ayush Lingwal

Python Developer
Front-end Developer
Photo Editor
Video Editor
) } export default Intro
